body: Opportunity: Capstone Consulting is currently seeking a PHP and .NET Developer IDEAL CANDIDATE: Ideal candidates must have:•	Good English communication and written skills•	Master or Bachelor degree in Computer Science or Informatics•	Working experience with PHP and .NET•	Ability to learn new technologiesRESPONSABILITIES: Experience with the following technologies: •	Linux/Apache/MySQL/PHP stack application. Able to work on Linux environment over SSH. May develop on Windows environment (WAMP)•	Working knowledge of: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP Soap Libraries, TCPDF PHP libraries for generating reports, some basic LAMP administration, etc.•	WCF/ASP.NET/C# application with MS SQL Server backend deployed in IIS. Experience with those technologies will be required•	Source Control with GITJob Duties:•	Work directly with business and users to understand, document and resolve issues on a variety of computer systems•	Become expert on the custom Web and Reporting solutions•	Implement bug fixes, test, support business testing, perform deployment and support post-production validation•	Implement projects as required•	Document systems and changes•	Provide 2nd and 3rd level supportBENEFITS:•	Great culture, great work, chance to grow with a growing company •	Training in Capstone Agile Model by leading expert•	Team mentoring•	Excellent salary package and financial incentives•	Excellent work environment•	Laptop providedAre you ready for an exciting opportunity? Do you want to learn new technologies, systems and processes? Join an exciting team. Check us out and apply today! www.capstoneC.com
title: PHP and .NET Developer
locations: General Eremia Grigorescu, Timișoara, Județul Timiș, România
